about_the_game:
In Defense High, you find yourself in a peaceful land that is under siege by an unknown enemy of monstrous creatures. As the last line of defense, the fate of your people rests solely on your shoulders. Embrace the role of a skilled strategist and courageous defender, as you take charge of protecting the city from the relentless invasion.

Key Features
  • Engaging Tower Defense Gameplay: Prepare for an immersive and challenging experience with the classic Tower Defense genre. The game offers a top-view perspective, allowing you to oversee the battlefield and make strategic decisions. Your main objective is to construct and position defensive towers, each possessing unique attributes and abilities.
  • Diverse Tower Types: Choose from a plethora of tower options to suit your tactical preferences. Whether it's unleashing area-of-effect devastation, rapidly firing at foes, or slowing down enemy advances, each tower plays a crucial role in repelling the monstrous onslaught.
  • Strategic Tower Placement: Your success lies in clever tower placement. Capitalize on natural chokepoints and terrain advantages to create an impenetrable defense. Additionally, manipulate enemy paths with strategic mining to impede their progress and buy your towers precious time.
  • Upgrade and Enhance: As you progress through the game, you'll earn gold from vanquishing foes. Invest this currency wisely to upgrade your towers. Strengthen their damage output, attack speed, and range, transforming them into formidable forces capable of halting even the most relentless waves.
  • Dynamic Enemy Waves: Prepare for an ever-increasing challenge as the game throws increasingly diverse and powerful enemies your way. From swift and agile adversaries to heavily armored monstrosities, you'll need to adapt your strategy to overcome each wave's unique threats.
  • Coin Collection and Power-ups: Quick reflexes are rewarded in Defense High. Defeated enemies drop valuable coins that disappear over time, urging you to swiftly collect them to fund your defenses. Moreover, unleash special power-ups like devastating artillery strikes or freezing enemy movements to turn the tide in your favor.
  • Epic Boss Battles: Every so often, confront massive boss creatures that pose a significant threat to your city. These fearsome foes require calculated tactics and coordination between your towers to bring them down.
  • Visually Stunning Experience: Immerse yourself in the beautifully drawn world of Defense High. The game's captivating visuals and attention to detail create an engaging and enthralling atmosphere.

name: Defense high

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: "Defend your land from invading creatures in Defense High! Place diverse towers strategically, mine enemy paths, collect coins, and upgrade towers for more power. Face challenging waves and bosses, use special abilities, and save your people in this action-packed Tower Defense game!"
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Hungarian*, Vietnamese*, Greek*, Danish*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Dutch*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Thai*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Finnish*, Czech*, Swedish*, Japanese*, Azerbaijani*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Afrikaans*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bangla*, Bosnian*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Dari*, Zulu*, Hebrew*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, Icelandic*, Yoruba*, Kazakh*, Kannada*, Catalan*, Quechua*, Kinyarwanda*, K'iche'*, Konkani*, Xhosa*, Khmer*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Persian*, Serbian*, Sotho*, Sinhala*, Sindhi*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Uzbek*, Uyghur*, Urdu*, Filipino*, Hausa*, Hindi*, Croatian*, Cherokee*, Scots*, Estonian*
